Parameters:
index - start index
m - message to encode
Returns:

encodeFinalBytes

                                                              byte[] m)
Encode into base 64 3 bytes of message m starting at index and adding padding as necessary

Parameters:
index - start index
m - message to encode
Returns:
the 3 bytes in base 64 with padding (if necessary)
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index < 0 and index >= m.length-2

decode

public static final byte[] decode(java.lang.String m)
Decodes the base64 string m into the corresponding byte array

Parameters:
m - the message to decode
Returns:
the byte array that corresponds to m
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if message length is not a multiple of 4
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the message contains any invalid character

decode

private static final byte[] decode(int index,
                                   java.lang.String m)
Decodes 4 characters (starting at index) of the base64 string m into the corresponding byte array

Parameters:
index - starting index
m - the message to decode
Returns:
the byte array that corresponds to m
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the message contains any invalid character
java.lang.NullPointerException - if index is not a valid index of m
